text: Macrocnemum is a genus of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It contains the following species (but this list may be incomplete): * Macrocnemum cinchonoides, (Wedd.) Wedd. * Macrocnemum jamaicense, L. * Macrocnemum pilosinervium, Standl. == References == * Category:Rubiaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Macrocnemum
